About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Graduate Coding Academy bootcamp,
Full-Stack Web Developer with knowledge in advanced technologies and concepts, such as Vue.js, Vuex, React, Redux, Angular, Node.js, MongoDB, and ES6. Always eager to learn and develop within the work environment while focusing on problem solving and detailed orientation.
Passionate about the field, team player, fast learner.
